generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk visible on the left side of the road, separated from the road by a curb.
- vegetation: There are trees and bushes visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: There is grass and soil visible on the right side of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast.
- person: Two people are visible crossing the road in the distance.
- traffic sign: There are stop signs visible on both sides of the road.
- pole: There are poles visible supporting the stop signs and other traffic signs.
- fence: There is a white fence visible in the background, separating the road from the vegetation.
- building: There is a building visible in the background, partially obscured by vegetation.
- wall: There is a wall visible in the background, partially obscured by vegetation.
